mapper.select: SELECT rb.id AS boardId, MAX(l.city) AS city, -- MAX()나 다른 집계 함수를 사용 rb.title, rb.thumbnail, DATE_FORMAT(rb.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createdAt, DATE_FORMAT(rb.updated_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS updatedAt, DATE_FORMAT(rb.start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS startDate, DATE_FORMAT(rb.end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS endDate, rb.is_visible AS isVisible, COUNT(rl.id) AS likeCount, COUNT(rc.id) AS cmtCount FROM record_board rb INNER JOIN location l ON rb.location_id = l.id LEFT JOIN record_like rl ON rb.id = rl.record_id LEFT JOIN record_comment rc ON rb.id = rc.record_id WHERE rb.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY rb.id -- l.city 대신 rb.id만 GROUP BY에 사용 ORDER BY rb.created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
